turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I need you to call Papa Johns and put in an order for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. The one by your home, or office, or a different one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one by my house please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. What is your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It will be 3 large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The first one will be pepperoni with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second one will be just extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The third will be sausage and mushrooms with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Would you like to pick it up or have it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For delivery.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Delivered to where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: My home please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any sides, drinks, or desserts?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Two 2-liter bottles of pepsi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want this order put in now or at a later time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Now will be ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else sir?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I think that will do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I will put in your order of 3 large pizzas. One pepperoni with extra cheese, one with just extra cheese, and one with sausage and mushrooms. And two 2-liter bottles of Pepsi from Papa Johns for delivery.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome sir.
